title: Hurulu Forest Reserve: Fire destroys 2,500 acres; Arson suspected:
content: A bush fire in the Hurulu Forest Reserve, Habarana affected over 2,500 acres yesterday, with officials claiming that there was a strong possibility that the fire may have been caused due to an act of arson.
